steps.guideText: Remove the DEEBOT top cover, switch on your DEEBOT and wait until a startup sound is played.
Short press the reset button 1S and then release, confirm to hear "start to enter the network distribution mode".
Remove the DEEBOT top cover, switch on your DEEBOT and wait until a startup sound is played.
Short press the reset button 1S and then release, confirm to hear "start to enter the network distribution mode".

steps.title: Power ON
steps.guideText: Open the DEEBOT cover, switch on your DEEBOT and wait until a startup sound is played.

steps.title: Turn on Bluetooth hotspot
steps.guideText: Briefly press the Reset button for 1 second, then release. Make sure you hear "Bluetooth hotspot released."

apHostspot.title: Release Hotspot
apHostspot.guideText: Press Reset and AUTO Mode Button at the same time and then release. Make sure you have heard the prompt "Ready for APP network setup".
apHostspot.confirmText: I've heard the prompt "Ready for APP network setup".

steps.title: Power ON
steps.guideText: Press and hold the [Power] button for 2s

steps.title: Prepare the robot
steps.guideText: Set the language displayed on GOAT

setPin.title: Prepare the robot
setPin.guideText: Set the power-on PIN code on GOAT

steps.title: Power on
steps.guideText: Press the “Filter Release” button, remove the filter. Turn on the power switch at the bottom of the filter.

steps.title: OK
steps.guideText:
Press the RESET button for 1s and release it; you should hear "Ready for network setup".
(Note: You'll need to scan the Network Setup QR Code and the robot's camera will automatically turn on; when network setup is complete, the camera will turn off.)

qrpStep.guideText: Tap the Generate Network Setup QR Code button below. Align the QR code with DEEBOT's camera in parallel with a height of 3-7cm (3.1'') to complete the scanning and network setup.

scanQRStep.guideText: Align this QR code with DEEBOT's camera in parallel with a height of 3-7cm (3.0''), and complete the scanning and network setup within 5 minutes.

steps.guideText: Connect the Air Quality Monitor to a power source. Make sure the Wi-Fi indicator starts flashing white.
Press and hold the Wi-Fi button on the top of the Air Quality Monitor for 5 seconds and then release. Make sure the Wi-Fi indicator has changed from white to orange.
steps.retryText: Press again if you didn't see it blinking orange.

steps.title: Power ON
steps.guideText: Press and hold WINBOT START button for 2 seconds to turn it on.

steps.title: Turn on your phone's Bluetooth.
steps.guideText: Please turn on Bluetooth and allow ECOVACS HOME to connect to WINBOT.

steps.title: Getting WINBOT Ready
steps.guideText:
Connect in the following sequence:
1. Connect the adapter to WINBOT.
2. Plug the adapter into a power socket.

steps.title: Power ON
steps.guideText: Press and hold WINBOT START button for 2 seconds to turn it on.

steps.title: Power ON
steps.guideText: Open the DEEBOT cover, switch on your DEEBOT and wait until a startup sound is played.

steps.title: Turn on Bluetooth hotspot
steps.guideText: Briefly press the Reset button for 1 second, then release. Make sure you hear "Bluetooth hotspot released."

apHostspot.title: Release Hotspot
apHostspot.guideText: Press Reset and AUTO Mode Button at the same time and then release. Make sure you have heard the prompt "Ready for APP network setup".
apHostspot.confirmText: I've heard the prompt "Ready for APP network setup".

steps.title: Power on
steps.guideText: Press and hold the POWER button 3 S to start up the robot, and wait for the startup music to end.

steps.title: Release Hotspot
steps.guideText: Press and hold the [Recharge] and [Spot] buttons for 3 seconds, and make sure you have heard the prompt "Entering network setup mode".

steps.title: Power ON
steps.guideText: Press and hold the power button until the music stops.

steps.title: Turn on Bluetooth hotspot
steps.guideText: Briefly press the Reset button for 1 second, then release. Make sure you hear "Bluetooth hotspot released."

apHostspot.title: Release Hotspot
apHostspot.guideText: Press the Spot Clean and Reset buttons together, and make sure you hear the prompt "Entering network setup mode".

steps.title: Turn on Bluetooth hotspot
steps.guideText: Press the Reset button for 1 s and then release it. Make sure you have heard the prompt "Bluetooth hotspot turned on".

apHostspot.title: Release Hotspot
apHostspot.guideText: Press the Reset button and the AUTO button at the same time, then release them after hearing the prompt "Network setup mode switched".
apHostspot.confirmText: I've heard the prompt "Network setup mode switched".

steps.title: Getting WINBOT Ready
steps.guideText:
Connect in the following sequence:
1. Connect the adapter to WINBOT.
2. Plug the adapter into a power socket.

steps.title: Power ON
steps.guideText: Press and hold WINBOT START button for 2 seconds to turn it on.

groupName: DEEBOT X8 PRO OMNI with Auto Refill and Drain

steps.title: Power ON
steps.guideText: Open the DEEBOT cover, switch on your DEEBOT and wait until a startup sound is played.

steps.title: Turn on Bluetooth hotspot
steps.guideText: Briefly press the Reset button for 1 second, then release. Make sure you hear "Bluetooth hotspot released."

apHostspot.title: Release Hotspot
apHostspot.guideText: Press the Reset button and the AUTO button at the same time, then release them after hearing the prompt "Network setup mode switched".
apHostspot.confirmText: I've heard the prompt "Network setup mode switched".

steps.title: Power ON
steps.guideText: Open the DEEBOT cover, switch on your DEEBOT and wait until a startup sound is played.

steps.title: Turn on Bluetooth hotspot
steps.guideText: Briefly press the Reset button for 1 second, then release. Make sure you hear "Bluetooth hotspot released."

apHostspot.title: Release Hotspot
apHostspot.guideText: Press the Reset button and the AUTO button at the same time, then release them after hearing the prompt "Network setup mode switched".
apHostspot.confirmText: I've heard the prompt "Network setup mode switched".

steps.title: Power on
steps.guideText: Press and hold the (OK) button for 3 seconds to power on. Wait for the screen to display "0000."

steps.title: Prepare the robot
steps.guideText: Press and hold the (Home) button. Release when the robot screen shows a 3-second countdown.

setPin.title: Prepare the robot
setPin.guideText: Set the power-on PIN code on GOAT

steps.title: Power on
steps.guideText: Press and hold the (OK) button for 3 seconds to power on. Wait for the screen to display "0000."

steps.title: Prepare the robot
steps.guideText: Press and hold the (Home) button. Release when the robot screen shows a 3-second countdown.

setPin.title: Prepare the robot
setPin.guideText: Set the power-on PIN code on GOAT

steps.title: Power on
steps.guideText: Press and hold [CLEAN] for three seconds to turn the robot on, and then wait for the startup music to end.

steps.title: Release Hotspot
steps.guideText: Briefly press the [SPOT] and [HOME] buttons and then release. Make sure you hear the prompt "Entering network setup mode"

apHostspot.title: Release Hotspot
apHostspot.guideText: At the same time, press and hold the [SPOT] and [HOME] buttons for two seconds and then release. Make sure you have heard the prompt “Entering network setup mode”.

steps.title: Power on

steps.title: Release Hotspot
steps.guideText: Briefly press the [SPOT] and [HOME] buttons and then release. Make sure you hear the prompt "Entering network setup mode"

apHostspot.title: Release Hotspot
apHostspot.guideText: At the same time, press and hold the [SPOT] and [HOME] buttons for two seconds and then release. Make sure you have heard the prompt “Entering network setup mode”.

steps.title: Preparation
steps.guideText: Open the DEEBOT cover, switch on your DEEBOT and wait until a startup sound is played.

steps.title: Preparation
steps.guideText: Short press the reset button 1S and then release, confirm to hear "Start to enter the network distribution mode"

steps.guideText: Briefly press the RESET button for 1 second and then release. You will hear that DEEBOT is ready for network setup.

steps.title: Power ON
steps.guideText: Press and hold the middle switch of the robot and wait for the startup sound to end.

steps.title: Release Hotspot
steps.guideText: Briefly press the RESET button for 1 second and then release. You will hear that DEEBOT is ready for network setup.

steps.title: Power on the robot.
steps.guideText: Press and hold Station POWER button for 2 seconds to turn it on. Wait for startup jingle to end.

steps.title: Turn on your phone's Bluetooth.
steps.guideText: Please turn on Bluetooth and allow ECOVACS HOME to connect to WINBOT.

steps.title: Getting WINBOT Ready
steps.guideText:
Connect in the following sequence:
1. Connect the adapter to WINBOT.
2. Plug the adapter into a power socket.

steps.title: Power ON
steps.guideText: Press and hold WINBOT START button for 2 seconds to turn it on.

steps.title: Getting WINBOT Ready
steps.guideText:
Connect in the following sequence:
1. Connect the adapter to WINBOT.
2. Plug the adapter into a power socket.

steps.title: Power ON
steps.guideText: Press and hold WINBOT START button for 2 seconds to turn it on.
Briefly press the RESET button for 1 second and then release. You will hear that DEEBOT is ready for network setup.
Turn the power switch to "I" to power on DEEBOT. Wait until the start sound ends. (Skip this step if DEEBOT is already on.)
Short press the reset button 1S and then release, confirm to hear "start to enter the network distribution mode".
Briefly press the RESET button for 1 second and then release. You will hear that DEEBOT is ready for network setup.
Remove the DEEBOT top cover, switch on your DEEBOT and wait until a startup sound is played.
Short press the reset button 1S and then release, confirm to hear "start to enter the network distribution mode".
Briefly press the RESET button for 1 second and then release. You will hear that DEEBOT is ready for network setup.
Briefly press the RESET button for 1 second and then release. You will hear that DEEBOT is ready for network setup.
Briefly press the RESET button for 1 second and then release. You will hear that DEEBOT is ready for network setup.
Briefly press the RESET button for 1 second and then release. You will hear that DEEBOT is ready for network setup.
Briefly press the RESET button for 1 second and then release. You will hear that DEEBOT is ready for network setup.
Briefly press the RESET button for 1 second and then release. You will hear that DEEBOT is ready for network setup.
Find the power switch on the side of DEEBOT, turn on the power switch, and wait for the music to end
Briefly press the RESET button for 1 second and then release. You will hear that DEEBOT is ready for network setup.
Briefly press the RESET button for 1 second and then release. You will hear that DEEBOT is ready for network setup.

steps.title: Activate ATMOBOT
steps.guideText: Open the ATMOBOT bottom cover, switch on your ATMOBOT and wait until a startup sound is played

steps.title: Activate ATMOBOT
steps.guideText: Briefly press the RESET button for 1 second and then release. You will hear "Entering network setup mode"
steps.retryText: Press again if you didn't hear the beep

steps.title: Connect Air Monitor
steps.guideText: Connect the air monitor to the power supply, and make sure the WiFi indicator starts blinking

steps.title: Connect Air Monitor
steps.guideText: Press and hold the RESET button on the top of the air monitor for 5 seconds and then release. Make sure that the WiFi indicator is rapidly blinking.
steps.retryText: Please press again if the Wi-Fi indicator is not rapidly blinking.
